00038    /*
00039    * Constructor.
00040    */
00041    ReplicaMove::ReplicaMove(System& system) :
00042       systemPtr_(&system),
00043       communicatorPtr_(0),
00044       myId_(-1),
00045       nProcs_(0),
00046       outputFile_(),
00047       nParameters_(0),
00048       interval_(-1),
00049       nSampling_(-1),
00050       ptPositionPtr_(0),
00051       myPositionPtr_(0),
00052       swapAttempt_(0),
00053       swapAccept_(0)
00054    {
00055 
00056       // Precondition
00057       if (!system.hasPerturbation()) {
00058          UTIL_THROW("Parent System has no Perturbation");
00059       }
00060 
00061       communicatorPtr_ = &(system.simulation().communicator());
00062       myId_   = communicatorPtr_->Get_rank();
00063       nProcs_ = communicatorPtr_->Get_size();
00064 
00065       // Generate output file name and open the file.
00066       //std::stringstream sMyId;
00067       //std::string fName("repx");
00068       //sMyId << myId_;
00069       //fName += sMyId.str();
00070       system.fileMaster().openOutputFile("repx", outputFile_);
00071 
00072       // Generate output file name and open the file.
00073       //std::stringstream energysMyId;
00074       //std::string energyfName("diff_energy");
00075       //energysMyId << myId_;
00076       //energyfName += energysMyId.str();
00077 
00078       // Initialize statistical accumulators.
00079       nParameters_ = system.perturbation().getNParameters();
00080    }
00081 
00082    /*
00083    * Destructor.
00084    */
00085    ReplicaMove::~ReplicaMove()
00086    {
00087       if (ptPositionPtr_) delete [] ptPositionPtr_;
00088       if (myPositionPtr_) delete [] myPositionPtr_;
00089    }

00091    /*
00092    * Read attempting interval.
00093    */
00094    void ReplicaMove::readParam(std::istream& in)
00095    {
00096       readBegin(in,"ReplicaMove");
00097       read<long>(in, "interval", interval_);
00098       if (interval_ <= 0) {
00099          UTIL_THROW("Invalid value input for interval_");
00100       }
00101       read<int>(in, "nSampling", nSampling_);
00102       if (nSampling_ <= 0) {
00103          UTIL_THROW("Invalid value input for nSampling_");
00104       }
00105 
00106       // Allocate memory
00107       int nAtom = system().simulation().atomCapacity();
00108       ptPositionPtr_ = new Vector[nAtom];
00109       myPositionPtr_ = new Vector[nAtom];
00110 
00111       readEnd(in);
00112    }
00113 
00114    /*
00115    * Perform replica exchange move.
00116    */
00117    bool ReplicaMove::move()
00118    {
00119       MPI::Request request[4];
00120       MPI::Status  status;
00121       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00122       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00123       int iA;
00124       int recvPt, sendPt;
00125   
00126       DArray<int> permutation;
00127       permutation.allocate(nProcs_);
00128 
00129       // Gather all derivatives of the perturbation Hamiltonians and parameters on processor with rank 0
00130       DArray<double> myDerivatives;
00131       myDerivatives.allocate(nParameters_);
00132       DArray<double> myParameters;
00133       myParameters.allocate(nParameters_);
00134 
00135       for (int i=0; i< nParameters_; i++) {
00136          myDerivatives[i] = system().perturbation().derivative(i);
00137          myParameters[i] = system().perturbation().parameter(i);
00138          }
00139 
00140 
00141       int size = 0;
00142       size += memorySize(myDerivatives);
00143       size += memorySize(myParameters);
00144 
00145       if (myId_ != 0) {
00146 
00147          MemoryOArchive sendCurrent;
00148          sendCurrent.allocate(size);
00149 
00150          sendCurrent << myDerivatives;
00151          sendCurrent << myParameters;
00152 
00153          sendCurrent.send(*communicatorPtr_, 0);
00154       } else {
00155          DArray< DArray<double> > allDerivatives;
00156          DArray< DArray<double> > allParameters;
00157          allDerivatives.allocate(nProcs_);
00158          allParameters.allocate(nProcs_);
00159    
00160          allDerivatives[0].allocate(nParameters_);
00161          allDerivatives[0] = myDerivatives;
00162          allParameters[0].allocate(nParameters_);
00163          allParameters[0] = myParameters;
00164 
00165          for (int i = 1; i<nProcs_; i++) {
00166             MemoryIArchive recvPartner;
00167             recvPartner.allocate(size);
00168             recvPartner.recv(*communicatorPtr_, i);
00169             allDerivatives[i].allocate(nParameters_);
00170             allParameters[i].allocate(nParameters_);
00171             recvPartner >> allDerivatives[i];
00172             recvPartner >> allParameters[i];
00173          }
00174 
00175          // Now we have the complete matrix U_ij = u_i(x_j), permutate nsampling steps according
00176          // to acceptance criterium
00177   
00178          // start with identity permutation
00179          for (int i = 0; i < nProcs_; i++)
00180             permutation[i] = i;
00181 
00182          for (int n =0; n < nSampling_; n++) {
00183             swapAttempt_++;
00184             // choose a pair i,j, i!= j at random
00185             int i = system().simulation().random().uniformInt(0,nProcs_);
00186             int j = system().simulation().random().uniformInt(0,nProcs_-1);
00187             if (i<=j) j++;
00188 
00189             // apply acceptance criterium
00190             double weight = 0;
00191             for (int k = 0; k < nParameters_; k++) {
00192                double deltaDerivative = allDerivatives[i][k] - allDerivatives[j][k];
00193                // the permutations operate on the states (the perturbation parameters)
00194                weight += (allParameters[permutation[j]][k] - allParameters[permutation[i]][k])*deltaDerivative;
00195              }
00196             double exponential = exp(-weight);
00197             int accept = system().simulation().random(). metropolis(exponential) ? 1 : 0;
00198    
00199             if (accept) {
00200                swapAccept_++;
00201                // swap states of pair i,j
00202                int tmp = permutation[i];
00203                permutation[i] = permutation[j];
00204                permutation[j] = tmp;
00205                }
00206          }
00207     
00208          // send exchange partner information to all other processors
00209          for (int i = 0; i < nProcs_; i++) {
00210             if (i != 0)
00211                 communicatorPtr_->Send(&permutation[i], 1, MPI::INT, i, 0);
00212             else
00213                 sendPt = permutation[i];
00214 
00215             if (permutation[i] != 0)
00216                communicatorPtr_->Send(&i, 1, MPI::INT, permutation[i], 1);
00217             else
00218                recvPt = i;
00219          }
00220       }
00221 
00222       
00223       if (myId_ != 0)
00224          {
00225          // partner id to receive from
00226          communicatorPtr_->Recv(&sendPt, 1, MPI::INT, 0, 0);
00227          // partner id to send to
00228          communicatorPtr_->Recv(&recvPt, 1, MPI::INT, 0, 1);
00229          }
00230 
00231       if (recvPt == myId_ || sendPt == myId_)
00232          {
00233          // no exchange necessary
00234          outputFile_ << sendPt << std::endl;
00235          return true;
00236          }
00237 
00238       assert(recvPt != myId_ && sendPt != myId_);
00239 
00240       Vector myBoundary;
00241       myBoundary = system().boundary().lengths();
00242             
00243       Vector ptBoundary;
00244             
00245       // Accomodate new boundary dimensions.
00246       request[0] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(&ptBoundary, 1,
00247                                            MpiTraits<Vector>::type, recvPt, 1);
00248 
00249       // Send old boundary dimensions.
00250       request[1] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(&myBoundary, 1,
00251                                             MpiTraits<Vector>::type, sendPt, 1);
00252 
00253       request[0].Wait();
00254       request[1].Wait();
00255              
00256       system().boundary().setOrthorhombic(ptBoundary);
00257 
00258       // Pack atomic positions and types.
00259       iA = 0;
00260       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < system().simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec){
00261          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter){
00262             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00263                myPositionPtr_[iA] = atomIter->position();
00264                iA++;
00265             }
00266          }
00267       }
00268       
00269       // Accomodate new configuration.
00270       request[2] = communicatorPtr_->Irecv(ptPositionPtr_, iA,
00271                        MpiTraits<Vector>::type, recvPt, 2); 
00272 
00273       // Send old configuration.
00274       request[3] = communicatorPtr_->Isend(myPositionPtr_, iA,
00275                        MpiTraits<Vector>::type, sendPt, 2);
00276 
00277       request[2].Wait();
00278       request[3].Wait();
00279       
00280       // Adopt the new atomic positions.
00281       iA = 0;
00282       for (int iSpec=0; iSpec < system().simulation().nSpecies(); ++iSpec){
00283          for (system().begin(iSpec, molIter); molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter){
00284             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter){
00285                atomIter->position() = ptPositionPtr_[iA];
00286                ++iA;
00287             }
00288          }
00289       }
00290       
00291 
00292       // Notify component observers.
00293       sendRecvPair partners;
00294       partners[0] = sendPt;
00295       partners[1] = recvPt;
00296       Notifier<sendRecvPair>::notifyObservers(partners);
00297 
00298 
00299       // log information about exchange partner to file
00300       outputFile_ << sendPt << std::endl;
00301 
00302       return true;
00303 
00304    }
00305 
00306 }
00307 #endif
00308 #endif // ifdef UTIL_MPI
00309 #endif // ifdef MCMD_PERTURB
